content: Ingredients: Fish and Assembly:  2 lbs Mahi-Mahi, cod, or halibut, cut into 2 inch pieces Neutral oil for searing Mango salsa or pico de gallo Flour tortillas  Spice Rub:  1 tablespoon chili powder 1 tablespoon paprika 1 tablespoon cumin 2 teaspoons kosher salt 1 teaspoon onion powder 1 teaspoon garlic powder 1 teaspoon oregano 1 teaspoon black pepper 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper  Avocado Cilantro Sauce  7 oz Greek yogurt 1 cup fresh cilantro, roughly chopped 1 clove garlic 1/2 avocado 2 limes, zested and juiced 1 teaspoon kosher salt 1 teaspoon ground cumin 1/3 cup water, plus more as needed 1 jalapeño 1 teaspoon chili oil, or to taste  Instructions:  Blend together all ingredients for avocado cilantro sauce, adding more water as needed for viscous but pourable consistency. Evenly coat all sides of fish pieces in spice rub. Add oil to sauté pan over medium-high heat. Sear fish in batches until crisp and/or blackened, about 4 minutes per batch. Serve in tortillas with avocado sauce and mango pico de gallo.
summary: Seared fish, avocado-cilantro sauce, mango pico de gallo
title: Blackened Fish Tacos

content: Ingredients:  1 (8 oz) jar of sun-dried tomatoes 1-1 1/2 lbs boneless skinless chicken thighs, cubed 1 1/2 teaspoons dried basil 1 1/2 teaspoons dried oregano 1 teaspoon dried thyme 1 teaspoon paprika Red pepper flakes Salt and pepper, to taste 3/4 cup grated parmesan cheese 2 tablespoons salted butter 2 cloves garlic, minced 12 oz short cut pasta (rigatoni) 1 cup heavy cream 2 teaspoons Dijon mustard 1 cup fresh Thai basil Zest of one lemon  Instructions:  Drain 3 tablespoons of oil from the sun-dried tomato jar into a large pot or skillet with sides. Chop the sun-dried tomatoes and set aside. Set a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add the chicken, 1 teaspoons each of basil, oregano, and thyme, the paprika, and a pinch each of red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Cook until golden brown, about 5 minutes. Add 1/4 cup parmesan, cook another minute, then remove the chicken from the pot. To the same pan, add the butter, garlic, 1/2 teaspoon basil, and 1/2 teaspoon oregano. Cook until fragrant, about 3 minutes. Add 3 1/2 cups water. Bring to a boil, add the pasta, and cook, stirring often, until the pasta is al dente, about 8 minutes. Stir in the cream, mustard, parmesan, Thai basil, and chopped sun-dried tomatoes. Slide the chicken and any juices left on the plate. Serve the pasta topped with lemon zest and fresh parmesan.
summary: Creamy, rich sauce with sun-dried tomatoes, basil, chicken, and lemon
title: Creamy Sun-dried Tomato Chicken Pasta

content: Ingredients:  1 bottle of young and fruity red wine Equal amount of lemon-flavored soda (or substitute with equal mixture of lemonade and sparkling water) 1 orange, sliced 1 lemon, sliced 6 oz sweet vermouth (optional) Ice  Instructions:  Pour the wine into a large pitcher. Add the soda and stir slightly. Add the lemon and orange slices, as well as the vermouth if using. Stir just to combine. Serve over ice.
title: Tinto de Verano

content: Ingredients:  1 oz gin 1/2 oz lemon juice 1/2 oz simple syrup 3 oz Champagne or Prosecco Ice for shaking  Instructions:  Add the gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup to a shaker with ice and shake until well-chilled. Strain into a Champagne flute or Coupe glass. Top with the Champagne. Garnish with a lemon twist.
title: French 75

content: Ingredients:  2 oz tequila 2 oz grapefruit juice 2 oz sparkling water, preferably Topo Chico 1/2 oz lime juice 1/4 oz simple syrup Crushed ice Course sea salt, for rim  Instructions:  Salt the rim with a grapefruit or lime wedge and coarse sea salt. Add tequila, grapefruit juice, sparkling water, lime juice, and simple syrup to a glass. Fill the remainder of the glass with crushed ice. Garnish with grapefruit wedge or dehydrated grapefruit.
title: Paloma

content: Ingredients:  1 lime, quartered 3/4 oz granulated white sugar or 1 oz simple syrup 2 oz white rum 5-8 mint leaves Crushed ice 4-6oz sparkling water, preferably Topo Chico  Instructions:  Add quartered lime, sugar, and mint to a Tom Collins glass and muddle for 30 seconds. Fill the remainder of the glass with crushed ice. Pour the rum over the ice. Fill with sparkling water to the rim. Stir briefly. Garnish with mint sprig.
summary: Lime, mint, white rum, Topo Chico
title: Classic Mojito
